name: Kaizou ChouJin Shubibinman Zero
overview: Kaizou Choujin Schbibinman Zero is a view-limited Downloadable Game for the Satellaview that ran between March 30, 1997 and February 28, 1998. It is a pseudo-sequel to the earlier Kaizou Choujin Schbibinman and Kaizou Choujin Schbibinman 2: Aratanaru Teki (known as Shockman in English).
